name: intro-2
text: H-hey there, a new visitor! Many apologies, but until I get all of this under control, I am afraid the exhibit is closed... unless...

name: intro-1
text: Oh no! I forgot to lock up last night and all the animals got loose! The exhibit is about to open and-

name: intro-0
text: *You hear fast footsteps approaching you at the entrance of the exhibit.*

name: intro-3
text: Would you like to help me find all of the missing creatures? I would greatly appreciate your help- you could even explore the exhibit for free!

name: intro-4
text: That's great! But first, where are my manners? What is your name, sweetheart?

name: about-1
text: Enter any of our lovely exhibits, and [insert mechanic].

name: about-2
text: If you manage to find a new pet, you can click on them to read a bit of information about their breed.

name: about-3
text: Now, let us continue the search!

name: about-0
text: Hello there, ! Are you here to ask for guidance?
